text: The family is one of nature’s masterpieces.
author: George Santayana

text: The love of a family is life’s greatest blessing.
author: Unknown

text: Family is not an important thing. It’s everything.
author: Michael J. Fox

text: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: Family is the heart of a home.
author: Unknown

text: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: Family is the most important thing in the world.
author: Princess Diana

text: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The family is one of nature’s masterpieces.
author: George Santayana

text: Family is where life begins and love never ends.
author: Unknown

text: Family is the anchor that holds us through life’s storms.
author: Unknown

text: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

text: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
author: Anthony Brandt

text: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

text: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
author: Barbara Bush

text: The memories we make with our family is everything.
author: Candace Cameron Bure

text: In time of test, family is best.
author: Burmese Proverb

text: The family is a haven in a heartless world.
author: Christopher Lasch

text: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
author: Pope John XXIII

text: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other’s life.
author: Richard Bach

text: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
author: Denis Waitley

text: There is no doubt that it is around the family and the home that all the greatest virtues… are created, strengthened and maintained.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The family is a school of compassion because it is here that we learn to live with other people.
author: Karen Armstrong

text: A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another.
author: Buddha

text: Families are the compass that guides us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
author: Brad Henry

text: A man should never neglect his family for business.
author: Walt Disney

text: Family is the first word in the language of life.
author: Unknown

text: Family: Where life begins and love never ends.
author: Unknown

text: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
author: Wanda Hope Carter

text: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
author: George Santayana

text: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Family is not an important thing, it's everything.
author: Michael J. Fox

text: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
author: Anthony Brandt

text: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: Family is the most important thing in the world.
author: Princess Diana

text: The informality of family life is a blessed condition that allows us to become our best while looking our worst.
author: Marge Kennedy

text: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
author: Charles Kuralt

text: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
author: Richard Bach

text: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
author: Guy Lafleur

text: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: A man should never neglect his family for business.
author: Walt Disney

text: Our family is a circle of strength of love with every birth and every union the circle grows.
author: Unknown

text: Family is the anchor that holds us through life's storms.
author: Unknown

text: The best thing about having a family is that you know that they will always love you and support you no matter what.
author: Unknown

text: The memories we make with our family is everything.
author: Unknown

text: A family is a gift that lasts forever.
author: Unknown

text: Families are like branches on a tree, we grow in different directions yet our roots remain as one.
author: Unknown

text: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works is the family.
author: Lee Iacocca

text: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
author: Jane Howard

text: I sustain myself with the love of family.
author: Maya Angelou

text: No matter what you've done for yourself or for humanity, if you can't look back on having given love and attention to your own family, what have you really accomplished?
author: Lee Iacocca

text: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
author: Desmond Tutu

text: The greatest gift of family life is to be intimately acquainted with people you might never even introduce yourself to, had life not done it for you.
author: Kendall Hailey

text: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
author: John C. Maxwell

text: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

text: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
author: Alex Haley

text: The family is a haven in a heartless world.
author: Christopher Lasch

text: When all the dust is settled and all the crowds are gone, the things that matter are faith, family, and friends.
author: Barbara Bush

text: Being a family means you are part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.
author: Lisa Weedn
